channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Sentinel - The baron
channel.description:
>**The sentinel** Blue dragon killing **Passive: Elite training** Immune to death once **Night ability: Stand guard** (infinite uses) everyone who attempts to visit your target will visit you instead. You will know everyone who tried to visit your target. **Night ability: Retaliation** (2 uses) Kill someone who voted 'execute' on a member of the blue dragon the previous day.
>**The Baron** Unseen offensive **Passive: Elite training** Immune to death once **Night ability: Stand guard** (Infinite uses) everyone who targeted your target will _unknowingly_ change targets to you.

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Sentinel - The baron
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I just gave it 2 uses now (retaliation)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Sentinel - The baron
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I understand what you are saying. The thing is he can only do it after a BD was lynched. I might give it limited uses (the retaliation)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Sentinel - The baron
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
I think the risk for Sentinel is too low.

Maybe give it Knight guilt?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Sentinel - The baron
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
The sentinel
Blue dragon killing
Passive: Elite training
Immune to death once
Night ability: Stand guard
(infinite uses) everyone who attempts to visit your target will visit you instead. You will know everyone who tried to visit your target.
Night ability: Retaliation
(2 uses) Kill someone who voted ‘execute’ on a member of the blue dragon the previous day.

The Baron
Unseen offensive
Passive: Elite training
Immune to death once
Night ability: Stand guard
(Infinite uses) everyone who targeted your target will unknowingly change targets to you.

Read full topic
